TopicTitle: I finally landed on Mun but now I can't get back into the ship!

Articles.Content:
I'm so frustrated and relieved at the same time. I'd spent days trying to land on Mun and finally did it a few minutes ago, but after doing an EVA, I found that I placed my steps wrongly and can't get back in the ship! I really wanted to do the return trip, as I have enough fuel, but I can't find a way back in.

Here's a picture for reference: http://i.imgur.com/deaG3.jpg

As you can see, I didn't put steps on the decoupler, so he can't get up to the capsule.

Is there any way I can do it?

From my limited understanding the EVA has a jetpack sort of device, so push 'r'.

WASD then controls basic, and shift/alt up and down.

Cheers,

Zero

press r to enable rcs then press and hold left shift to climb. Release left shift before you go to high. Then, turn the camera square to your rocket and once high enough, bump the w key a few times to move forward.
Get off the ladder, push 'R' and then hold 'shift' to go up. Use wasd keys to move around and fly yourself to the hatch.
